text: Ephemerelloidea is a superfamily of mayflies in the suborder Pannota. It is a basal group of mayflies with a worldwide distribution. Members of this super- family can be distinguished from those of Caenoidea by the fact that the gills of the nymphs are not filamentous. The following families are recognised: *Ephemerellidae *Leptohyphidae *Tricorythidae ==References== Category:Mayflies
title: Ephemerelloidea
